parameters.query: =INSERT INTO sensors (company_name, product_id, device_id, property_name, property_value) VALUES ('{{ $json.companyName }}', '{{ $json.productId }}', '{{ $json.deviceId }}', '{{ $json.propertyName }}', '{{ $json.propertyValue }}') ON CONFLICT (company_name, product_id, device_id, property_name) DO UPDATE SET property_value = EXCLUDED.property_value;
